title: 686 - Letter to a Younger Soda Machine Self | Stan Chronicles #4
description:
We find out the origin of Stan’s name and it is full of numerals, running on and on like the sweet humming at the back of the fridge that keeps your dreams cool…as cool as the James Dean of soda machines.

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new websitehttp://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:20)
